title: Come To Mommy: A Mommy Domme, Submissive Little Boy, ABDL Story
description: An exciting new series from bestselling author Amy Cummings about a Little and his Mommy. Meet Evan and Rebecca… After being married for over ten years, Evan finally confesses that he is a submissive. Rebecca embraces her role as his Domme. Soon, though, another secret is Evan is also a Little! This thrusts the couple into a whole new world and takes their power exchange dynamic to new heights. Wanting to explore more, Rebecca secures an invite to the mysterious Chateau Babylon, a place where Littles and Bigs can openly live as they desire. And a place where Evan’s submission and insecurities will be tested. Come to Mommy is a quick, fast-paced read that features consenting adults engaged in Age Play. It is the first in a new series and serves as an introduction to Evan and Rebecca and their fun, sexy world! Please note that this is not the usual Daddy/Little Girl story typical of Amy Cummings. It features a Female-Led-Relationship, domestic discipline (including spanking), humiliation (in a loving relationship, not mean-spirited), and plenty of Age Play, ABDL action. For adults only. Have fun!
author: Amy Cummings
